models.hero: The hero section content including title, subtitle, and call-to-action button.
models.kpis: Key Performance Indicators showing program impact as animated counters.
models.featuredModels: A selection of AI models highlighted in the Toolbox preview section.
models.sectionPreviews: Preview cards for other sections of the site with thumbnails and descriptions.

relationships: KPIs link to relevant sections when clicked (e.g., AI Models KPI links to Toolbox)
Featured Models are a subset of all AIModel entities from the Toolbox
Section Previews link to their corresponding section pages

hero.title: AI4Startups
hero.subtitle: Empowering African startups with open-source AI models, hackathons, and ecosystem support

featuredModels.name: AgriYield Predictor
featuredModels.description: Machine learning model for predicting crop yields based on weather patterns and soil data across Sub-Saharan Africa.

featuredModels.name: HealthTriage AI
featuredModels.description: NLP-based symptom checker trained on African health data to assist community health workers with patient triage.

featuredModels.name: FinCheck Credit Scorer
featuredModels.description: Alternative credit scoring model using mobile money transaction patterns for financial inclusion.

sectionPreviews.title: Hackathons
sectionPreviews.description: Discover our hackathon series across 8 African countries, challenge briefs, and winning solutions.

sectionPreviews.title: Ecosystem Activities
sectionPreviews.description: Explore networking events, research studies, and our Women Founders support program.

sectionPreviews.title: Partners
sectionPreviews.description: Meet the Team Europe partners and service providers making AI4Startups possible.
